Name: JIRA - Update Version Number
Description: Update FixVersions to Jira tickets based on release number being deployed

Parameters.Name: Jira.Version.Url
Parameters.Label: JIRA URL
Parameters.HelpText: The base URL of the JIRA Server (e.g. https://company.atlassian.net)

Parameters.Name: Jira.Version.Username
Parameters.Label: Username
Parameters.HelpText: The username of the account that will be used to update Jira ticket. The account should have sufficient permissions in JIRA to update ticket.

Parameters.Name: Jira.Version.Name
Parameters.Label: Version
Parameters.HelpText: The version that needs to updated to Fix Versions field in Jira ticket. If the version is not found, a new version will be created under respective project

Parameters.Name: Jira.Version.Query
Parameters.Label: JQL
Parameters.HelpText: The JIRA query that should be used to select issues that will be updated with Fix Versions (e.g. status = Completed AND Status = "Ready for Test Deploy")

Parameters.Name: Jira.Version.ProjectKey
Parameters.Label: Project Key
Parameters.HelpText: The project where version to be created

Parameters.Name: Jira.Version.GetVersionsAPIURL
Parameters.Label: Get Versions API URL
Parameters.HelpText: API URL to get all the versions from a particular project.

Parameters.Name: Jira.Version.CreateVersionAPIURL
Parameters.Label: Create Version API URL
Parameters.HelpText: API URL to create version on a particular project.
